data.name: Super Night Riders S1
data.detailed_description:
The Original Super Night Riders (2016)

https://store.steampowered.com/app/444000


About the Game



All screenshots are early work-in-progress.

Super Night Riders is a modern checkpoint arcade racer series inspired by 1980s retro classics.

Each season features an exclusive playable female pro racer and 36 stages in 6 locations.

Super Night Riders S1 (Season One) is a full remake of the original Super Night Riders (2016) improved on every aspect: Graphics, gameplay, features, balancing and rewards.

Play once more as Alice, the beautiful and talented motorcyclist known as the Red Rider, in the 6 original locations.



In this series, your position in the race does not matter. It's all about traveling as far as possible while dodging the other riders, and reaching each checkpoint before the timer hits zero.

All the races starts during the day and continue through the night right up until sunrise.

About neko.works
neko.works (neko dot works) is a one person indie game studio from France making modern renditions of classic concepts.

Also available from the studio is the ambitious Japanese-style RPG series Light Fairytale.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/539330

data.short_description: A full remake of the 2016 retro-inspired checkpoint arcade racer Super Night Riders.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 650
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
